StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: brick road
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: cracked brick road
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
